neighbors.name: Herbert L. & Joyce K. Dickens
neighbors.claims: Herbert L. and Joyce K. Dickens are listed as residents at 9723 Donahoo Road in Kansas City, KS ([SimpleContacts](https://www.simplecontacts.com/state/KS/Kansas-City/Donahoo-Road)). The property includes a single-family home built in 1979 situated on approximately 1.29 acres ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/KS/Kansas-City/9725-Donahoo-Rd-66109/home/83391793)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Longtime residents; no public office found

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a trusted longtime community member reach out personally, emphasizing that the development will not disrupt the quiet rural atmosphere or scenic views they have enjoyed on their property.

neighbors.name: William L. & Kelli A. Carmack
neighbors.claims: William L. and Kelli A. Carmack reside at 9810 Hurrelbrink Road in the Piper area of Kansas City, KS ([PublicRecords](https://www.menstoppingviolence.org/people/kelli-carmack/)). Records indicate Kelli Carmack previously lived in Clovis, California, before moving to Kansas City ([PublicRecords](https://www.menstoppingviolence.org/people/kelli-carmack/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No known civic roles; private residents

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Carmacks with a straightforward, factual discussion addressing how their property values and peace and quiet will be protected. A small neighborhood Q&A session could help answer their questions and build trust.

neighbors.name: Neal P. & Nicole M. Edwards
neighbors.claims: Neal P. and Nicole M. Edwards are the owners of a residence at 9805 McGurk Road in Kansas City, KS ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/KS/Kansas-City/9804-McGurk-Rd-66109/home/97210679)). Public records list Nicole M. Edwards as a resident at this address ([FreeBackgroundChecks](https://freebackgroundchecks.com/people-search/nicole-edwards/)). Family obituaries link Neal and his wife Nicki (Nicole) to the Kansas City area ([Obituary](https://www.alleeholmanhowe.com/obituaries/carol-ruth-elena-beaman)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private citizens; no public roles confirmed for this specific individual

approach_recommendations.engage: Highlight any community benefits from the project (like improved roads or tax revenue for local services) and proactively address potential traffic or safety concerns in person, perhaps with a local official available to answer their questions.
